name: PlaygroundLiveViewRepresentation
desc: The supported types for displaying for live views in playgrounds.

items.name: case view(UIView)
items.desc: A UIKit view that's displayed as the live view.

items.name: case viewController(UIViewController)
items.desc: A UIKit view controller whose view is displayed as the live view.

items.name: case view(NSView)
items.desc: An AppKit view that's displayed as the live view.

items.name: case viewController(NSViewController)
items.desc: An AppKit view controller whose view is displayed as the live view.
